object.name: getMyDescription
object.description: Use this method to get the current bot description for the given user language. Returns BotDescription on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to get the current bot description for the given user language. Returns BotDescription on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to get the current bot description for the given user language. Returns :class:`aiogram.types.bot_description.BotDescription` on success.

annotations.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string
annotations.html_description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string
annotations.rst_description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string
annotations.name: language_code
